scripts.postdependencies: cp -r node_modules tasks/dependabotV1/node_modules && cp -r node_modules tasks/dependabotV2/node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:V1 && npm run build:V2
scripts.test: npm run test:V1 && npm run test:V2
scripts.package: node vss-extension.version.increment.js && npx tfx-cli extension create --manifests vss-extension.json --output-path dist
scripts.package:dev: npx tfx-cli extension create --manifests vss-extension.json --output-path dist/dev --overrides-file vss-extension.overrides.dev.json
scripts.package:prod: npx tfx-cli extension create --manifests vss-extension.json --output-path dist/prod --overrides-file vss-extension.overrides.prod.json
